item.title: Http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,221459.0.html
item.dc:creator: @killer90210 killer90210
item.description:
@killer90210 wrote:

my ipban fully works so hold on

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { String victim = command.substring(6); int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Heyman")) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!"); } else if(playerRights <= v.playerRights && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Nic")) { sendMessage("You can not IP ban someone who has equal or higher rights!"); } else { if(server.banHandler.checkAlreadyBannedIps(v.connectedFrom)) { sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!"); } else { sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully IP banned"); server.banHandler.appendToIp(v.connectedFrom); v.disconnected = true; } } } catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) { sendMessage("That player is either offline or the name is invalid"); } }
change the nic to your name

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

[quote=“hippyss, post:11, topic:162712”][quote author=major492 link=topic=221275.msg1915698#msg1915698 date=1196913605]
ok make a new notepad named Commands in you server then in it copy and paste this

if(command.startsWith(“ipban”)
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
PlayerHandler.kickNick = otherPName;
sendMessage(p.connectedFrom+" is now banned.");
{

And then close it and save then compile.Dont give me da reward now wait until it works in case of errors and stuff kk
[/quote]you made me lol :)[/quote]

Lmao? Your programming knowledge Sucks, no offence… Anyways I fixed the Safe and Danger zone thingy… All thats left now is a PlayerCount and Server-Name, and A working IP Ban command.
